name: TechieMatter, Inc.
description: Developer of a recruitment platform intended to find the desired technical talent. The company's platform connects employers with prospective candidates through a network of various tech verifiers, information technology sources, filters and technical assessments, enabling companies to find the right talent that fits their needs.
